definitions.definition: One eighth of the total area of the celestial dome ; used as a measure of cloudiness (one okta means that one eighth of the sky is obscured, two oktas that one quarter is obscured, and so on).

main_definition: ( meteorology ) One eighth of the total area of the celestial dome ; used as a measure of cloudiness (one okta means that one eighth of the sky is obscured, two oktas that one quarter is obscured, and so on).
